an7.74:1.1: “Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, arako nama sattha ahosi titthakaro kamesu vitarago.
an7.74:1.2: Arakassa kho pana, bhikkhave, satthuno anekani savakasatani ahesum.
an7.74:1.3: Arako sattha savakanam evam dhammam deseti:
an7.74:1.4: ‘appakam, brahmana, jivitam manussanam parittam lahukam bahudukkham bahupayasam mantayam boddhabbam, kattabbam kusalam, caritabbam brahmacariyam, natthi jatassa amaranam.
an7.74:2.1: Seyyathapi, brahmana, tinagge ussavabindu suriye uggacchante khippamyeva pativigacchati, na ciratthitikam hoti;
an7.74:2.2: evamevam kho, brahmana, ussavabindupamam jivitam manussanam parittam lahukam bahudukkham bahupayasam mantayam boddhabbam, kattabbam kusalam, caritabbam brahmacariyam, natthi jatassa amaranam.
an7.74:3.1: Seyyathapi, brahmana, thullaphusitake deve vassante udakabubbulam khippamyeva pativigacchati, na ciratthitikam hoti;
an7.74:3.2: evamevam kho, brahmana, udakabubbulupamam jivitam manussanam parittam lahukam bahudukkham bahupayasam mantayam boddhabbam, kattabbam kusalam, caritabbam brahmacariyam, natthi jatassa amaranam.
an7.74:4.1: Seyyathapi, brahmana, udake dandaraji khippamyeva pativigacchati, na ciratthitika hoti;
an7.74:4.2: evamevam kho, brahmana, udake dandarajupamam jivitam manussanam parittam …pe…
an7.74:5.1: Seyyathapi, brahmana, nadi pabbateyya durangama sighasota haraharini, natthi so khano va layo va muhutto va yam sa avattati, atha kho sa gacchateva vattateva sandateva;
an7.74:5.2: evamevam kho, brahmana, nadipabbateyyupamam jivitam manussanam parittam lahukam …pe…
an7.74:6.1: Seyyathapi, brahmana, balava puriso jivhagge khelapindam samyuhitva akasireneva vameyya;
an7.74:6.2: evamevam kho, brahmana, khelapindupamam jivitam manussanam parittam …pe…
an7.74:7.1: Seyyathapi, brahmana, divasamsantatte ayokatahe mamsapesi pakkhitta khippamyeva pativigacchati, na ciratthitika hoti;
an7.74:7.2: evamevam kho, brahmana, mamsapesupamam jivitam manussanam parittam …pe…
an7.74:8.1: Seyyathapi, brahmana, gavi vajjha aghatanam niyamana yam yadeva padam uddharati, santikeva hoti vadhassa santikeva maranassa;
an7.74:8.2: evamevam kho, brahmana, govajjhupamam jivitam manussanam parittam lahukam bahudukkham bahupayasam mantayam boddhabbam, kattabbam kusalam, caritabbam brahmacariyam, natthi jatassa amaranan’ti.
an7.74:9.1: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussanam satthivassasahassani ayuppamanam ahosi, pancavassasatika kumarika alampateyya ahosi.
an7.74:9.2: Tena kho pana, bhikkhave, samayena manussanam chaleva abadha ahesum—
an7.74:9.3: sitam, unham, jighaccha, pipasa, uccaro, passavo.
an7.74:9.4: So hi nama, bhikkhave, arako sattha evam dighayukesu manussesu evam ciratthitikesu evam appabadhesu savakanam evam dhammam desessati:
an7.74:9.5: ‘appakam, brahmana, jivitam manussanam parittam lahukam bahudukkham bahupayasam mantayam boddhabbam, kattabbam kusalam, caritabbam brahmacariyam, natthi jatassa amaranan’ti.
an7.74:10.1: Etarahi tam, bhikkhave, samma vadamano vadeyya:
an7.74:10.2: ‘appakam jivitam manussanam parittam lahukam bahudukkham bahupayasam mantayam boddhabbam, kattabbam kusalam, caritabbam brahmacariyam, natthi jatassa amaranan’ti.
an7.74:10.3: Etarahi, bhikkhave, yo ciram jivati so vassasatam appam va bhiyyo.
an7.74:10.4: Vassasatam kho pana, bhikkhave, jivanto tiniyeva utusatani jivati—
an7.74:10.5: utusatam hemantanam, utusatam gimhanam, utusatam vassanam.
an7.74:10.6: Tini kho pana, bhikkhave, utusatani jivanto dvadasayeva masasatani jivati—
an7.74:10.7: cattari masasatani hemantanam, cattari masasatani gimhanam, cattari masasatani vassanam.
an7.74:10.8: Dvadasa kho pana, bhikkhave, masasatani jivanto catuvisatiyeva addhamasasatani jivati—
an7.74:10.9: atthaddhamasasatani hemantanam, atthaddhamasasatani gimhanam, atthaddhamasasatani vassanam.
an7.74:10.10: Catuvisati kho pana, bhikkhave, addhamasasatani jivanto chattimsamyeva rattisahassani jivati—
an7.74:10.11: dvadasa rattisahassani hemantanam, dvadasa rattisahassani gimhanam, dvadasa rattisahassani vassanam.
an7.74:10.12: Chattimsam kho pana, bhikkhave, rattisahassani jivanto dvesattatiyeva bhattasahassani bhunjati—
an7.74:10.13: catuvisati bhattasahassani hemantanam, catuvisati bhattasahassani gimhanam, catuvisati bhattasahassani vassanam saddhim matuthannaya saddhim bhattantarayena.
an7.74:11.1: Tatrime bhattantaraya kapimiddhopi bhattam na bhunjati, dukkhitopi bhattam na bhunjati, byadhitopi bhattam na bhunjati, uposathikopi bhattam na bhunjati, alabhakenapi bhattam na bhunjati.
an7.74:11.2: Iti kho, bhikkhave, maya vassasatayukassa manussassa ayupi sankhato, ayuppamanampi sankhatam, utupi sankhata, samvaccharapi sankhata, masapi sankhata, addhamasapi sankhata, rattipi sankhata, divapi sankhata, bhattapi sankhata, bhattantarayapi sankhata.
an7.74:11.3: Yam, bhikkhave, satthara karaniyam savakanam hitesina anukampakena anukampam upadaya;
an7.74:11.4: katam vo tam maya etani, bhikkhave, rukkhamulani etani sunnagarani. Jhayatha, bhikkhave, ma pamadattha; ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha. Ayam vo amhakam anusasani”ti.
